Events that occurred on 25 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1900 - Author and philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche dies.
1930 - Actor Bruce Allpress is born.
1947 - Artist Michael Kaluta is born.
1957 - Author Ian Brodie is born.
1963 - Actress Brianne Siddall is born.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 327.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Glyn Daniel
1974 - Mythcon 5 at Scripps College in Claremont, California.
1988 - The Return of the Shadow is published in the UK.
2003 - Starter decks of "The Countdown Collection", a special set of The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, are released.
2006 - The Oxford Tolkien Conference at Exeter College, Oxford.
2007 - The Tolkien Society's Australian Seminar 2007 in Sydney, Australia.
2010 - A middle English vocabulary is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
